channel.title: PwnScape v1 v2 development
channel.description:
[u][b]THIS THREAD WAS APPROVED BY MOD TAHAROK[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://img360.imageshack.us/img360/475/pwnscapebanner2yc6.gif[/img]
[size=10pt]Welcome to my development thread![/size]
not started
half way done/ somewhat started
completed =]
had to restart barrows =[
one connection per ip added
dragon claws spec: almost done just need to get the spec bar working and 4 hits =/
clanchat:95% creating interfaces soon [img]http://img292.imageshack.us/img292/9971/39370900cb6.jpg[/img] [img]http://img292.imageshack.us/img292/5941/50796299qd3.jpg[/img] [img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/3879/13985265ss8.jpg[/img] [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/2479/52579959lw4.jpg[/img]
if you would like to apply or give a suggestion please use this your template
suggestion or application or both?: if suggestion (or both) what is it?: coding experience email (if both or coding): are you good with web design?: would u actualy help with the development unlike the other people that say they will then dont?: do you have any experience setting up a mysql server?:
i am a noob when it comes to making custom interfaces, if you would like to help me add/make some i would be very grateful ^^

item.title: PwnScape v1 v2 development
item.dc:creator: @joeyjoe9876 joeyjoe9876
item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

@Absentnos: i like that you took the web design class, but could u give me an example of a command that would tele you and spawn a box of danger signs around you?

@the soul: ill post it right away i dont want this locked lol

heres teh original request

[quote=“Taharok”][quote author=joeyjoe9876 link=action=profile;u=323337 date=1229892808]
could i start a thread asking for a development team for my latest project?
[/quote]

If you do it respectfully and have shown how much work you have now/are planning on doing, sure.[/quote]

heres my request for him to delete my old thread so i can make a new one with less flame

[quote=“Taharok”][quote author=joeyjoe9876 link=action=profile;u=323337 date=1232666767]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

theres the link to it, but im going to make a new thread about it to attract more people, not going to use the same format tho as i noticed all i did was get flamed =/
[/quote]

Though this is not something I would normally allow, I will allow you to do it.[/quote]
